title: What is notice of assets?
question: Dear sir or madam,
answers: You should be receiving your discharge shortly but ONLY if you have have taken your Financial Management course and filed form 23 with the court. Otherwise your case will be closed without a discharge.
Your creditors have 60 days from the date first set for the meeting with the Trustee in your case. You should get your discharge after that 60-day period expires if no objections are filed.

Your attorney is right. It is a no asset bankruptcy meaning creditors will not receive anything. It just takes time administratively to finalize the discharge.
